channel.title: Summoned pet Banking~~
channel.description:
Hello,
I am using Berky Scape source, and want to make that a pet can bank or open ur bank when you talk to them. Im kinda new and have no clue how to do this. Could someone help me? Allready big thanks!
-Saratan

item.title: Summoned pet Banking~~
item.dc:creator: @DemonsworldOwner DemonsworldOwner
item.description:
@DemonsworldOwner wrote:

First, get a pet to be able to follow you, then mix it in with interfeaces from the bank command.
